thread.title: New York turns white as latest nor'easter hits U.S. East Coast

title: New York turns white as latest nor'easter hits U.S. East Coast
text:
New York turns white as latest nor'easter hits U.S. East Coast   00:40 
Millions of commuters along the U.S. East Coast are facing another round of heavy snow, ice and wind gusts on Wednesday as the fourth major snow storm this month is striking the region, closing schools, grounding flights and halting buses and trains. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
